cz.muni.fi.xstupka.rwtester.graph
Class GraphBuilder

java.lang.Object
  cz.muni.fi.xstupka.rwtester.graph.GraphBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphFactory
public class GraphBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphFactory

This class builds the graph. You can use this class to create a graph manually.

Constructor Detail

GraphBuilder

public GraphBuilder(boolean directed,
                    boolean weighted)
Creates a new instance of GraphBuilder.

Parameters:
directed - true whether the graph should be directed
weighted - true whether the graph should be weighted
Method Detail

addEdge

public void addEdge(java.lang.String vertexA,
                    java.lang.String vertexB)
Adds a new unweighted edge to the graph. If the graph is directed orientation of this new edge is from vertex A to vertex B. If the graph is weighted default weight of the edge is 1.

Parameters:
vertexA - name of the vertex A
vertexB - name of the vertex B
See Also:
addEdge(String vertexA, String vertexB, int weight)

addEdge

public void addEdge(java.lang.String vertexA,
                    java.lang.String vertexB,
                    int weight)
Adds a new weighted edge to the graph. If the graph is directed orientation of this new edge is from vertex A to vertex B. If the graph is unweighted weight parameter is not used.

Parameters:
vertexA - name of the vertex A
vertexB - name of the vertex B
weight - weight of the edge
See Also:
addEdge(String vertexA, String vertexB)

addVertex

public void addVertex(java.lang.String name)
Adds a new vertex to the graph.

Parameters:
name - name of the new vertex

getGraph

public Graph getGraph()
Returns created graph.

Specified by:
getGraph in interface GraphFactory
Returns:
created graph
